GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19.7 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
USB: gadget: Fix obscure lockdep violation for udc_mutex

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 1a065e4673cbdd9f222a05f85e17d78ea50c8d9c, it was introduced in version v5.19.7 by commit f44b0b95d50fffeca036e1ba36770390e0b519dd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: USB: gadget: Fix obscure lockdep violation for udc_mutex
